column4: I'm trying to install Java following the instructions I get on the wiki. However, I'm getting that "No matching plugin was found." error, and the solution on the wiki isn't working. Anybody have an idea?
when are you gettting that error?
when I do this: geoff@trademeet:~/archive/programming$ DEB_BUILD_GNU_TYPE=i386 fakeroot make-jpkg jre-1_5_0_06-linux-i586-1.bin
seems like you made a typo
I know, I tried with i386-linux too
maybe they mean export DEB_BUILD_GNU_TYPE=i386-linux; and then do the rest of the line.
I get the same thing :( I know I exported right because when I echo the var, it returns i386-linux ...
you are doing this on a 386?
do you *need* to build it?  There are ready-made deb's available
wait until after it installs successfully ;o
